title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 20 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 20 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Democrats know they have nobody who can beat Trump. Media glued to Roger Stone sentencing. There's no rift between Barr and Trump. Bolton blasts Dems' partisan impeachment. Trump tweet on Dem debate: It's not so easy to do what I did. Fauxcahontas goes Megyn Kelly on Bloomberg, Bloomberg has no response. Rush struggling with how much to talk about cancer diagnosis, treatment. Bloomberg was right about Bernie's communism. Democrat debate was funny, but also scary if these people ever get the presidency again. Cambridge law allows illegals to drive without licenses. Stone judge agrees with Trump and Barr, gives Stone lesser sentences than prosecutors asked for. Democrats on that stage were humorless. Trump laughs at himself.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Obama judge blasts Stone, but gives sentence Barr recommended. MSNBC post-debate analysis. Poll shows Trump beating generic Democrats. Sharyl Attkisson: Trump has already won second term. Crazy Bernie is in driver's seat. Why didn't Tulsi attract any Democrats? Donald Trump has character and heart, can do optimism. Rush gives some details of Trump convincing him to go to the SOTU. Big TV rating for debate. Conventional wisdom in media is that Bloomberg blew it, but Democrat voters may not see it that way. Doug Schoen pines for a moderate Democrat Party that never really existed. Andrew Yang says Bloomberg is calling donors, telling them not to donate to other candidates.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

CNN obsessed with Stone, can't figure out that none of this is working to get rid of Trump. Trump on West Coast swing, signs executive order on water to help California farmers, slams Dems on homelessness. Trump honors 100-year-old WWII vet at Phoenix rally. Caller on Mayor Pete and black voters. Bloomberg on transgenders. Lib eggheads can't figure out who won the debate. McAuliffe sees brokered convention. F. Chuck Todd asks Bloomberg if he should exist, if he should have that much money. Caller on line for Trump's Colorado rally. Trump fixed Obama economy, Dems saying Obamacare must be fixed. Huge TV audience for debate. Bloomberg vs. Bernie on communism and capitalism. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
